body:
Hello guys,
Today I found a MCChecker, and want to share it with you; because some people do not know it and it'd be cool know if you will change your name, if it's available. 
The link to the MCChecker is https://iaero.me/mcchecker .
If you type there a name, it is going to say if the name is available, premium or not premium.
:)
 I don't know why, but when I checked kycrafft...

It says it is available. I don't think it is, is it an error or a joke? Or maybe a fact? I really don't know.
Hope this helped! :)
Now go and check if the username you want for your new name is available!
(Hope this is not taken as spam/advertising.)
Note: I did not do this website. I don't get any credit.
